source_id.description: Unique identifier of the Source that produced the Grain

flow_id.description: Unique identifier of the Flow that contains the Grain

origin_timestamp.description: A TimeStamp representing the capture time of the Grain Payload. For Grain Payloads with multiple samples, this shall be the sample time of the first sample. When capturing from a live source this should match the SyncTimeStamp. When replaying stored essence this should be populated from the Origin Timestamp of the stored Grain.

sync_timestamp.description: a TimeStamp representing the capture or playback time of the Grain Payload. For Grain Payloads with multiple samples, this shall be the sample time of the first sample.

type.description: Typical usage is to denote the event type

control_id.description: Unique identifier of the Control that produced the Grain.

device_id.description: Unique identifier of the Device that produced the Grain.

creation_timestamp.description: A TimeStamp representing the creation time of the Grain

time_offset.description: Integer representing a time offset in milliseconds

state.description: Used to indicate the state as an integer

status_map.description: An array of statuses, each consisting of a name (string) and a description (string)

name.description: A name for the status pair

extended.description: Freeform object containing additional properties. Can be empty.
